amendment.description: To provide for the importation of prescription drugs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 990 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Cloture on amendment SA 990 invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 63 - 28. Record Vote Number: 150.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 990 presented in Senate.
Amendment SA 990 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S5380-5385, S5387-5388) To provide for the importation of prescription drugs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 990 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
